Text: Hi Bro can u upload f1 2010 Media3.cab File Please?
does someone have an idea what is the OFFICIAL PC SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS for this game, hopefully both the MINIMUM and the RECOMMENDED ones. thank you.

Recommended Specs:

VGA - Nvidia 512 (8,9,GTX) ATi (HD 4650)
CPU - Core 2 Quad 2.66
RAM - 2GB
HDD - 8 GB Free Space
Display - HD 720p Resolution or Higher (Optional)

Minimum Specs :

VGA - 256 (Shader Model 3.0 Enabled)
CPU - Dual Core
RAM - 1GB
